Business and room hire

Excellent value meeting, work and study spaces and resources across Suffolk.

The Hub at Ipswich County Library

A spacious, modern meeting space in the heart of Ipswich. Three large meeting rooms, presentation equipment, internet access, refreshments and air conditioning.

Hire a room in The Hub

Room and space hire

Most of our libraries offer excellent value spaces for hire. Some also offer refreshments, projectors and other meeting equipment.

Find a room to hire near you

Northgate Room Ipswich hire

Hire the Northgate room in Ipswich County Library for weddings and other ceremonies.

Hire the Nortghate Room
